sentences.en: A GREat dowry is a bed full of brambles.
sentences.cn: 满屋的嫁妆犹如满床荆棘.

sentences.en: A natural endowment or gift a dowry.
sentences.cn: 自然的赋予或礼物;嫁妆.

sentences.en: Although ours has been so pure and poor That you can take them no great dowry.
sentences.cn: 贫俭诚所尚,资从岂待周!

sentences.en: As a wife , the woman was protected by the setting up of a dowry or decimum.
sentences.cn: 给已婚妇女备有一份嫁妆,或者称为“decimum”,以使其受到保护.

sentences.en: As long as there dowry, they can buy many things.
sentences.cn: 只要有财礼, 就能够买到许多东西.

sentences.en: Finally all - sided to review the women's status of the Renaissance Italy under the dowry system.
sentences.cn: 最后,本文认为应从两个方面看待这个时期嫁妆体系下女性地位问题.

sentences.en: How could I utter for shame that I keep for dowry this poverty.
sentences.cn: 我又要如何羞惭地说我的妆奁竟是这般的贫穷.

sentences.en: I had to give back a portion of the dowry after the divorce.
sentences.cn: 离婚后,我不得不归还我的那份嫁妆.

sentences.en: My father - in - law's portion of the dowry was seven cows.
sentences.cn: 我 岳父 给我的嫁妆是起头奶牛.

sentences.en: Never will she measure his love by the dowry he give her.
sentences.cn: 她从不会以他赠给她的新娘礼物来衡量他的爱.

sentences.en: The Lambo ( second one ) also part of the dowry!
sentences.cn: 这几辆兰博车也是嫁妆的一部分!

sentences.en: The marriage contract should specify all unmarried couples property, dowry and fiance fiancee industries.
sentences.cn: 婚约中要写明未婚夫妇的全部财产 、 未婚妻的嫁妆和未婚夫的产业.

sentences.en: The money from her dowry was invested in her mother's store.
sentences.cn: 她的嫁妆钱都投到了母亲的铺子里。

sentences.en: When demands for dowry are not met , the bride is 19 torture, and often even killed.
sentences.cn: 当嫁妆不符要求时, 新娘19.易受折磨, 甚至被杀害.

sentences.en: You will receive a dowry and make me an equal partner?
sentences.cn: 也就是说你拿到嫁妆后要跟我合伙?

trans.tran_en: property and money that a woman gives to her husband when they marry in some societies
